title: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO CHO GATH
body:
As an avid Cho Gath player I was shocked to come back from my month abroad to one particular change to my favourite champion.

AN ACTIVE E (with BS output)...... not only has this severely changed the damage output in lane, it has also changed the QWR hand placements.

NOT. HAPPY. RIOT.

To my fellow Cho's, vent away. To the remaining cho haters, enjoy your newfound ability to kill us at range.

replies.body: He's one of the strongest champions right now you idiot they made use of a useless toggle ability and gave him infinite stacks on his ultimate, spoilt brat.
some of us don't like our champs to be permabanned however. Cho'gath was almost never banned at any elo before the rework. Now I'm yet to see a game where Cho'gath isn't banned.

This is why you're bronze 5 years in a row...

Cho gath gotten buffs. He is even played in the professional scene. Old cho gath only nub would not turn off E and pushed lane 24/7. Use it and turn it off, no big deal.
